author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two women were crushed to death and 21 others suffered injuries when a Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation (TNSTC) bus collided with a lorry at Marichikatti in Parthibanur police station limits in the district on Tuesday evening.

Police said the bus was coming from Madurai when the lorry from Parthibanur dashed against it after the driver overtook a vehicle and lost control.

Two women, travelling in the bus died on the spot and one of them was identified as Maruthayi (60).

The other woman, who could not be identified was aged about 40 years, police said. The drivers of both the lorry and bus were among the 21 injured.

While 11 of the seriously injured were taken to Government Rajaji Hospital, Madurai, others were admitted to the Government hospital in Paramakudi, police said.

A portion of the right side of the ‘One to One’ express bus was ripped off and those who were seated on the right side bore the impact, police said.

The front portion of the lorry was reduced to a mangle in the impact.

Among those injured in the accident were lorry driver and another occupant in the lorry and 19 bus passengers.
title: Two killed in accident
